   As Hedge wa=
ited for an answer she looked over at Sniper, "Sniper, 
did you scan the pl=
anet for other Bots and their Bases?"

   Sniper, surprised by the sudden c=
omment quickly thought in his 
head.  He then looked over at Hedge, "Yes ma=
m'."

   "And did you get the location of the bases?"  Hedge asks.

   "Yes=
."  Sniper says.

   "Well where is it."  Hedge asks.

   "Ohh, under the c=
omputer file Mapterranearth.geo"  Sniper says.

   "Well pull it up."  Hedg=
e says.

   "Right, Computer please access computer file Mapterranearth.geo=
."  
Sniper says.

   The Computer responded, "File access."

   Hedge and =
the other in the room studied the Map.  

   "Computer please make 5 portab=
le copies of this file."  Hedge says.

   "Files copied."  The computer say=
s.

   "Good, tell a drone to send one file to my room and another file 
in=
 the mess quartors."  Hedge says

   "Drone told, what would you like done =
with the other three?"  the 
Computer says.

   "Give one to Sniper, Sqril,=
 and Ga-ga-bot."  Hedge says.

   A drone rolls into the room with walkman =
like thingys in a tray.  
The Drone says to each of the Three bots, "Please=
 take one.  This is 
from Mistress Hedge."

   Sniper, Sqril, and Ga-ga-bot=
 take one.  Hedge then spins around in 
her chair.

   "I have a mission fo=
r you three.  Sqril, I want you to go to the 
Maximals base in Africa.  Sni=
per and Ga-ga-bot, I want you to go to 
the base right off of future spain(=
Alliance Island.)  I am sending 
bot of you because I know maximals will no=
t attack unless provolked, 
but the other base, I do not have a reading wea=
ther they are maximals 
or predacons so I am sending both of you incase you=
 run into some 
trouble."  Hedge says.

   "But Mistress Hedge, don't you t=
hink I should go to the maximal 
base because I was once a Maximal?"  Snipe=
r says.

   "Good call Sniper, so Sqril, you go with Ga-ga-bot to the base =

near spain and Sniper, you go to the maximal base."

   The three bots oth=
er than Hedge said in Unison, "Yes Mam'."

   Ga-ga-bot then said, "What wo=
uld you like us to do when we get to 
the bases?"

   "Tell them that the C=
ybertron Mob is looking for Allies.  Ask them 
to comm. me on the comm. sys=
tem."  Hedge says.

   The Three bots went on their Merry way.
